## Welcome to the Big Data Ignite RMarkdown example!

Here we will show how amazingly simple and useful our workflow is!

We can now plot the increasing awesomeness of this talk:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
curve(exp, xlim=c(0,40),main = "Awesomeness of Presentation", ylab = "Awesome Units", xlab = "Time (minutes)")
```
